short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare images by overlaying them on websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare images by overlaying them on websites.
A tool that allows you to overlay design images on a website to compare and check if it matches the design when creating a website.

You can upload an image file or copy the image from Figma to the clipboard and paste it into the extension.
